title: my account had been hijacked by someone and now im banned help
body: i stopped playing for i dont even know how long tried to log in and none of my passwords were working. i reset my password and now it says im banned. i dont even know how much money ive poured into this game but id rather it not be a waste. i would like some sort of help.

replies.body: I am this persons wife and one time we logged in to duo and he was in mid game. he changed his password and the person was off the account at that point but all his friends were deleted including me. We thought nothing of it because he made a new password and we were playing with no problems. So if anyone could help us out that would be cool cuz I need me gamer buddy >.<

Don't worry, we can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account team will be able to help with recovery, reparations, and updating your info.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can, but in the meantime run through our [account protection guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)to secure your info in and outside of League.  We'll see you in your ticket!
